--- select_singer_with_limit_and_skiprows.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
LIMIT 100
OFFSET 10

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   &ast.Limit{
      Limit: 26,
      Count: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 32,
        ValueEnd: 35,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "100",
      },
      Offset: &ast.Offset{
        Offset: 36,
        Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 43,
          ValueEnd: 45,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "10",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers LIMIT 100 OFFSET 10
